data.name: X-Plane 10 AddOn - Aerosoft - Airport Rio de Janeiro-Santos Dumont
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


Santos Dumont Airport (SBRJ) is a central airport located close to the financial center of Rio de Janeiro operating domestic flights. Built in the 30s on top of an embankment at Guanabara Bay, Santos Dumont airport was the first civil airport opened in Brazil. Today it’s the second busiest airport in the state of Rio de Janeiro.

This ultra-high resolution replica of Santos Dumont Airport contains custom runways, apron and taxi ways with ambient occlusion. The authentic mesh convinces with tons of static objects surrounding landmarks. The fully animated airport including animated vehicles, ships and barges create a lifelike rendition of the airport. Last but not least the animated 3D-grass and the superior lighting with night textures and HDR effects create an outstanding atmosphere.

The airport is installed in an area of 833,000 square meters, with two runways with a capacity of 29 operations per hour. This structure provides the capacity to serve 9.9 million passengers a year and is named after the Brazilian aviation pioneer Alberto Santos Dumont (1873-1932).

Features:

Ultra-High Resolution replica of Santos Dumont Airport
Custom runways, apron and taxiways with ambient occlusion
Many static objects
Animated vehicles, ships and barges.
3D grass, true to Airport type.
Airport and surrounding areas high-quality Mesh.
Mesh designed using the excellent 'Remexe' tool
Partial rendering inside terminals
Superior lighting
HDR Effect, indoor lighting environment, Terminal and Jetways.
Night texture and HDR lighting
Textures personalized with ambient occlusion.
Fully animated airport
Animated Ground Service and aircraft traffic (default)
Auto Gate with DGS and ramp Marshall
35 SBRJ Charts included

Tons of surrounding landmarks included:

Sugar Loaf hill and Morro da Urca
Animated cable car (Bondinho)
Rio-Niteroi Bridge with vehicle traffic.
Ilha Fiscal (Fiscal Island)
Ilha das Enxadas (Hoe Island)
Ilha das Cobras (Snake Island)
Naval College.
Prana XV, the Ferry Station.
3 Helipads SDHU SIJP and SNUO
Buildings Adjacent to heliports

data.short_description: Santos Dumont Airport (SBRJ) is a central airport located close to the financial center of Rio de Janeiro operating domestic flights. Built in the 30s on top of an embankment at Guanabara Bay, Santos Dumont airport was the first civil airport opened in Brazil. Today it’s the second busiest airport in the state of Rio de Janeiro.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: MultiCore Processor with 3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 2GB (4 GB or higher is recommended)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: MultiCore Processor with 3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 2GB (4GB or higher is recommended)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or compatible
  • Processor: MultiCore Processor with 3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 2GB (4GB or higher is recommended)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
